N = int(input())
V = list(map(int, input().split()))
C = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    if V[i] > C[i]:
        ans += V[i] - C[i]

print(ans)

import math
import sys


def main():
    n = int(input())
    values = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    costs = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    max_value = 0
    for i in range(1, 2**n):
        value = 0
        cost = 0
        for j in range(n):
            if ((i >> j) & 1):
                value += values[j]
                cost += costs[j]
        max_value = max(max_value, value - cost)
    print(max_value)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
